title: Analyze Pole Inspection Imagery
description: An asset manager uses an AI model to analyze drone imagery of thousands of utility poles to identify defects.

tasks.description: Process and categorize a large batch of pole inspection images.
tasks.expected_outcome: System ingests and organizes the imagery.

tasks.description: Run a computer vision model on the images to detect and classify defects like rot, woodpecker damage, and cracked crossarms.
tasks.expected_outcome: AI model flags 50 poles with potential defects requiring review.

tasks.description: Prioritize the flagged poles for follow-up physical inspection based on the severity of the detected defects.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a prioritized list of poles for field crews to inspect.
